name: natursutten orthodontic pacifier
description:
Natursutten natural pacifiers are the perfect solution for parents who want to keep phthalates, Bisphenol-A and other scary chemical compounds out of their little ones' mouths. Ethically produced in Europe, Natursutten pacifiers are made entirely from all-natural rubber milk that comes from sustainably harvested rubber trees. Therefore, the pacifiers are biodegradable; you can toss them in the compost bin when your child grows out of them.

Besides being a healthy, safe product with a low environmental impact, Natursutten pacifiers are quite simply a great, high-quality product. The rubber is incredibly strong and durable, yet extremely soft; it's meant to closely simulate breastfeeding. It follows your child's natural mouth movements, and doesn't leave any marks on his or her face.

name: box of colorful wooden blocks
description:
This plexi and wood box holds 27 cubes in the most delicious colors.  These blocks do not have a lacquer finish.  The color is deeply saturated into the wood giving a very rich appearance to the blocks.

The basic cube is the best block to start a child with as it offers so many possibilities and encourages imagination.  Simple stacking is an early milestone and what fun to reach it with blocks like these.

categories.name: toys for toddlers and big kids

name: knot hat - basic white
description:
A simple white knot hat.  The perfect addition to any outfit.  
Sckoon Organics achieves this pure white color by using peroxide to bleach the cotton. Unlike chlorine bleaches, peroxide is not harmful to aquaculture when released into waterways.

100% organic cotton

made by Sckoon Organics in India

name: eco-friendly sheepskin
description:
The softest sheepskin, made specifically for infants to use in the crib or on the floor as a playmat.  It is tanned in a traditional method using Mimosa tree extract instead of harsh chemicals.  There are no other chemicals on this product as wool is naturally flame retardant.

A wonderful way to create a welcoming environment for baby in cradle or crib. Sheepskins have been used to soothe colicky babies.  Children become very attached to them; my 4 year old daughter still sleeps on hers every night.

The sheepskin do not need frequent washing.  Spot cleaning and airing is usually enough to freshen them up.

This product is approximately 3 ft long and is in a natural pelt shape.  It comes in an unbleached cotton storage bag.

Will be back in stock week of October 21st, 2013.
